author: C. A. Gadina
description: As Jason Clapham (the Difford's Guide reader who brought this citrusy sweet 'n' sour cocktail to our attention in February 2020) says, it's "essentially a cherry Sidecar." Those with sweeter palates may want to add a splash of sugar syrup.
name: Eider Duck
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
